body:
The ListWorkflow API for basic visibility does not support filter like `StartTime > "2022-05-16T10:41:43-06:00"`, it require the filter in the form of `StartTime BETWEEN "2022-05-16T10:41:43-06:00" AND "2022-05-17T11:41:43-06:00"`. This is not obvious and would cause a lot of confusing for user.

Server should support >, >=, <, <= for basic visibility as well.

comments.body: No plan to improve basic visibility APIs. We decided to deprecate basic visibility API and unify on advanced visibility APIs. SQL visibility store now supports advanced visibility.

title: ListWorkflow API for basic visibility should support filter like StartTime > SOME_TIME
